creator: Poelmann, Isaac  Weller, Jacob  Bredovius, Petrus  Weberus, Gottfried
title: M. Isaaci Pölmanni, Neukirchensis Varisci, Schönbergae & Langvicii, proxime Berlinum Pastoris decrepiti, Crepitaculum Grammaticum, Sive Dissertatiuncula De Lingua Etruscorum
source: Poelmann, Isaac  Weller, Jacob  Bredovius, Petrus  Weberus, Gottfried: M. Isaaci Pölmanni, Neukirchensis Varisci, Schönbergae & Langvicii, proxime Berlinum Pastoris decrepiti, Crepitaculum Grammaticum, Sive Dissertatiuncula De Lingua Etruscorum  Quam Dn. D. Jacobus Wellerus, p.m. in Grammatica Graeca Nova, asserit, solam accentum, qui syllabam pronunciando elevat, non raro ultra tertiam a fine syllabam collocare. Coloniae Ad Spream  Berlin 1688
alternative: Quam Dn. D. Jacobus Wellerus, p.m. in Grammatica Graeca Nova, asserit, solam accentum, qui syllabam pronunciando elevat, non raro ultra tertiam a fine syllabam collocare
subject: Historische Drucke
